channel.title: CVE Feed for inqsys -- Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type
channel.description: The latest CVEs for inqsys -- Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type

item.title: CVE-2023-4792|2023-09-07T01:52:17.103Z -- inqsys -- duplicate%20post%20page%20menu%20%26%20custom%20post%20type
item.description: The Duplicate Post Page Menu & Custom Post Type plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized page and post duplication due to a missing capability check on the duplicate_ppmc_post_as_draft function in versions up to, and including, 2.3.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with subscriber access or higher to duplicate posts and pages.
